game.name: RAILGRADE
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: RAILGRADE는 철도를 사용하여 세상 밖 식민지의 자원과 전력 산업을 이동시키는 시뮬레이션 게임입니다. 행성의 관리자가 되어 인프라의 처참한 붕괴 이후 산업 생산을 회복하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: RAILGRADE is the train RTS game! Construct dense vertical railroads, build cities, construct vast factory chains with train automation! Restore an off world colony's economy all in the intense story driven campaign or relaxing sandbox mode!

reviewHighlights.text: I like to relax after work with games that arent too stressful and yet still require some thinking. I've played a lot of Citi Skylines before to that...
I like this game a lot. Turn off the timer for even more chill experience-turns every mission into sandbox-ish play. Tons of missions.
